issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

Should not restrict activity to fixed orientation. This may not be suitable for different form factors, causing the app to be letterboxed.
Should not restrict activity to fixed orientation. This may not be suitable for different form factors, causing the app to be letterboxed.

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`

Use `app:drawableEndCompat` instead of `android:drawableEnd`
Use `app:drawableStartCompat` instead of `android:drawableStart`

Very long vector path (871 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
